author: Eliott C. McLaughlin, Amir Vera, Omar Jimenez and Julia Jones, CNN
title: Jury deliberations to begin Wednesday in federal civil rights trial of 3 ex-officers involved in George Floyd's killing
description: Jury deliberations will begin Wednesday in the federal trial of three former Minneapolis police officers involved in George Floyd's 2020 killing, US District Court Judge Paul Magnuson said Tuesday.
